title: ADSense Guard
shortDescription: All Tools that help you control your site
longDescription:
## Protection ##
Full protection of your site from all possible attacks with the most powerful protection methods in the world
## Services ##
We offer unique services to control your site and services that benefit all website owners to give you more advantages to improve your online activity.
## Tools##
We offer you a wide range of tools that help you control your site, ease of administration and tracking all events that happen on your site     
# Our Services

## CLICK FRAUD DETECTION
Prevents you to be banned and excluded from your AdSense account due to malicious third party clicks on your website.


## ANTIADBLOCK
Stop ad blocking on your site now AntiAdblock is an easy-to-use system for recapturing lost revenue from your website or blog


## REFERRER SPAM
Blocking all harmful and unwanted visits, we have the largest database of invalid referrals in the world and we also deal with the largest companies to detect fraud to ensure the highest level of protection


## PLAGIARISM CHECKER
Plagiarism checker is one of the most favorites and liked tool to detect copied content around the web. Whether that content is copied from educational purposes or a website’s content. We will detect it for you.


## ARTICLE SPINNER
Being a writer is not easy; every day, coming with new ideas and words is a challenging process. Rewriting a text is a solution, but still doing it manually is crucial to do. Our developers have made this tool to help writers to decrease their burden. Our tool is one of the precise rewriter tools that make changes in the article automatically as similar to a human will do so.


## SECURITY & MALWARE
cloud based application that scans websites and generates site scan web security reports. This online URL scanner investigates URLs and checks for viruses, hidden redirects, suspicious scripts, malicious media and other web security threats hidden into legitimate content and located on web sites. High-occuracy malware detection is provided by in-depth and comprehensive analysis .


## WEBSITE MONITORING
ADSense Guard is remote website uptime monitoring designed to help you detect website downtime which can mean lost revenue and profits. The worst thing is users may never return to your website again if they experience difficulties opening your webiste. Register for free website monitoring account and take control over downtime today!


## VISITOR ANALYTICS
Get priceless information about your website audience and learn how to improve its efficiency. Analyze your visitors behavior and understand how they interact on your website. ADSense Guard offers you two real-time reports, the main dashboard displays all metrics on a single page, allows you to monitor the current users activity on your website.


## WEBSITE ANALYSIS
If you want more website traffic from search engines, all you have to do is follow the feedback from our SEO analyzer tool. It will scan your site and point out all of the SEO errors you need to fix in order to increase your rankings. Your SEO Score is based on a number of ranking factors and we list them all in this analyzer report.


## NOTIFICATION CENTER
An integrated system for sending notifications to you in order to alert you of all events that happen on your site and includes all the services that we provide and you can control the sending of notifications as we support the transmission to the e-mail, the computer and your mobile device

# Full protection of your site from all possible attacks with the most powerful protection methods in the world
instructions:
#Installation Guide
+ Create a [free account][1]

[1]: https://adsenseguard.com/home/sign_up.
+ Once logged in, Enter your domain.
+ After completing the subscription, enter your eMail in the next box
